question: What is the full name of ISWC2022?
Where will the ISWC2022 conference take place physically?
What are the dates for the ISWC2022 conference?
What is the brief description of the ISWC2022 conference?
answer: ISWC2022 is the premier international forum for the Semantic Web and Knowledge Graph Community. ISWC2022 will bring together researchers, practitioners and industry specialists to discuss, advance, and shape the future of semantic technologies. Every year ISWC offers five exciting and fruitful days that you definitely don't want to miss! Looking forward to your participation in the ISWC2022 Conference!

question: What is the aim of the ISWC 2022 Posters and Demos Track?
answer: The ISWC 2022 Posters and Demos Track aims at offering an opportunity to present late-breaking research results, on-going research or resource projects, and speculative or innovative work in progress.

question: Who are the keynote speakers for the conference?
answer: Markus Krötzsch, Francesca Rossi and Ilaria Capua

question: What is the abstract of Ilaria Capua's presentation 'Circular Health'?
answer: Pandemics are unique and transformational events as they shake lives by exposing the vulnerability of Homo sapiens to previously unknown pathogens, which become widespread as most human beings on the planet will become infected. But Covid-19 has done much more than this. It has exposed us to another type of vulnerability – the vulnerability of the systems we operate in. It has also opened our eyes to the harsh reality that we live in a closed system, in which we are entirely interconnected and interdependent with other creatures on planet earth.

question: Where can I find the proceedings for Posters and Demos?
from: Menu>>Program>>Posters and Demos>>Posters and Demos Proceedings

question: Who are the Platinum Plus Sponsors of the conference?
What benefits does a Silver level sponsor get at the conference?
answer: Job posting for your company on conference website, Logo displayed prominently on conference website, Logo displayed between talks, Two free registrations (one remote registration, and one on-site registration that can be converted to remote upon request), Promotional material at conference venue, if the conference goes hybrid
